assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors are unaware of any conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Sequences used in this study were retrieved from the Ensembl Genome Browser (ExternalRef removed) and are shown in Supplementary Table S1. Human disease-causing missense variants were retrieved from HGMD (ExternalRef removed). The crystal structure of FIXa (6MV4) and GLA (3S5Z) were retrieved from the Protein Data Bank (PDB) (ExternalRef removed).
